overview: Feeling sad that her fellow Care Bears don't seem to appreciate her wishes, Wish Bear uses her wish star, Twinkers, to find some bears who love wishing as much as she does. That's when three new bears move to Care-a-lot...with some very unexpected results.

production_companies.name: Canadian Film or Video Production Tax Credit (CPTC)

tagline: It's the All-New CGI-Animated Care Bears Movie You've Been Wishing For!
title: Care Bears: Big Wish Movie
